import React, { Component } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; export default class Notification extends Component { state = { nots:[], curTime:"", selectedNotification:"" } takeNotifications = async () =>{ await axios({ url: "http://commerchant.herokuapp.com/notifications/", method: "GET", headers: { Authorization: window.localStorage.getItem("token"), }, }) .then((response) => this.setState({ nots:response.data.payload.notifications })) .catch(() => console.log("Profil gösterilemedi")); }; selectANot = ()=>{ this.nots.filter(obj => { return obj.b === 6 }) } componentWillMount(){ this.takeNotifications(); this.setState({curTime : new Date().toLocaleString()}) } render() { return (
